snippet: A lawyer for Casmine Aska, 17, who was charged with attempted murder, said he did not intentionally push the boy from their apartment building on Friday.
abstract: Lawyer for Bronx teenager Casmine Aska, charged with attempted murder and accused of throwing 9-year-old Freddy Martin from roof of their apartment, says he did not intentionally push the boy and that what happened was a 'tragic accident.'
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for Casmine Aska, 17, who was charged with attempted murder, said he did not intentionally push the boy from their apartment building on Friday.

headline.seo: Lawyer Calls Bronx Boy’s Fall From Roof ‘a Tragic Accident’
headline.main: Suspect Is Arraigned in 9-Year-Old’s Fall From a Bronx Roof
headline.print_headline: Suspect Is Arraigned in 9-Year-Old’s Fall From a Bronx Roof
